conbody.p: The connection specification includes parameters legal in Centera for FPPool_Open. These parameters include:

ul.li: PEA file location—for more information, see .
The username/secret for the PAI module to be used by the application—for more information, see .

conbody.p: The full syntax for the connection specification is one of the following:<IP_Address>[:<port>]|<Host_Name>[:<port>]?<path_to_PEA_file_on_SLS_hosts>
